general.gigTitle: design and develop any kind of website for you

sellerCard.oneLiner: Highly skilled and experienced web developer across all platforms
sellerCard.description: I am a passionate and experienced web designer with over 7 years of expertise in Web Development. Combining my technical skills with a strong background in graphic design, I create websites that are not only highly functional and user-friendly but also visually captivating. My goal is to deliver designs that leave a lasting impression while meeting your business needs.

description.content:
Looking for a Professional Website Developer? You're in the Right Place!


With over 7 years of experience, I've helped businesses build professional, high-performing websites that outshine the competition. Whether you need a one-time service or a long-term partnership, I'm here to deliver exceptional results tailored to your needs.



My Services:


﻿I specialize in WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Weebly, jQuery, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, CSS, and HTML, offering:


  • Full Website Creation
  • Ecommerce
  • Bug Fixing
  • Backup/Migration
  • SEO & Performance Optimization
  • API & Payment System Integration
  • Booking Systems
  • Theme/Plugin Customization or Creation
  • Redesigning & Speed Optimization


Need a service not listed? Let's discuss your unique requirements.


﻿Note:

Please contact me before placing an order to discuss your project. Let's create something amazing together!

slide.name: design and develop any kind of website for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: what do you need to start the projects
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Its depend on the project: If you want revamp or changes in your website then just your website  login details to your website. if you want new website then all the contents of the website including (images, logo, text, etc). And login details too.

packageList.title: Starter Website
packageList.description: 5 pages or a 5-section landing page, responsive and professional on any platform.

packageList.title: Advanced Website
packageList.description: 8 pages or an 8-section landing page, with integrations and enhanced design features.

packageList.title: Professional Website
packageList.description: 12 pages or a 12-section landing page, eCommerce-ready with premium features included.

reviews.comment: Faraz Ahmed was very professional. He clarify with all the changes that was made. It communicated very well. Working with him was perfect. Trusting him to deliver in a timely manger and get my website to what I would love was easy. I would good to him again.
As a new business owner and steward out, he assisted me with one headache off my to do list. I really appreciate his kindness and communication whenever I reached out.
Faraz was amazing to work with. He was proactive and an excellent communicator. I’d highly recommend working with him if you’re reading this.

Pleasure working with Faraz again. Delivery was on point
!
